all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For they shall be judged according to their works, and every man shall receive according to his own works, his own dominion, in the mansions which are prepared;
Doctrine and Covenants 76:111
Quote of the Day
"If we sincerely repent, humble ourselves, and trust and rely on the Lord, our hearts will be softened."
Elder Christopher H. Kim | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
